data.name: AI_Fluffy_Description
data.value: Fluffy uses an n-ply alpha-beta tree to figure out the best move. This is often called the minimax algorithm. In the last layer, heuristics are used to score the board position. Fluffy will always and only pass in response to its opponent passing. You may set the depth the AI will search. Increasing the depth will increase the AI's thinking time.

data.name: AI_DefeatistAI_Description
data.value: The strongest AI program in this game, the Defeatist will resign the first time it gets the chance to. You are simply not worth its time. After you make your first move, or even before that, the AI will conclude that it's much stronger than you and just resign in order to not play a game with a foregone conclusion.

data.name: AI_Fuego_Description
data.value: Fuego is a well-known open-source Go-playing engine written at the University of Alberta in Canada. It uses Monte Carlo tree search to make moves. It's capable of placing stones, passing and resigning, as the situation calls for. We recommend you use this AI program for all of your games.

data.name: AI_HeuristicPlayerWrapper_Description
data.value: This AI uses a simple heuristic to determine where to play the next move. The heuristic is based on influence and on all previous stone placements in the game history. This AI will pass only in response to its opponent passing, in which case it will always pass.

data.name: AI_RandomAI_Description
data.value: This AI will select a random position at which it can play and it will play there. It will pass as soon its opponent passes.

data.name: AI_RandomPlayerWrapper_Description
data.value: This AI plays random moves while the board is not empty. I dare you to let two Fish play against each other. The game will never end (unless you're very lucky).

data.name: CreditsToolTip
data.value: View information about the game authors and license information.

data.name: EnableEvenInOnlineGamesTooltip
data.value: It is frowned upon to use AI assistance during games against human opponents without their knowledge.

data.name: GameLibraryToolTip
data.value: Library of your past games and all your SGF files

data.name: HelpToolTip
data.value: Read the rules, documentation and other interesting information.

data.name: HighlightIllegalKoMovesTooltip
data.value: If you can't place a stone on a point because it would violate the Ko rule, the point will be highlighted.

data.name: HighlightRecentCapturesTooltip
data.value: If a stone was captured during the previous move, its intersection will be highlighted.

data.name: LanguageChangeInfo
data.value: Please, restart the game to see the language you have chosen.

data.name: LocalGameToolTip
data.value: Play Go against another player on the same device or against an AI.

data.name: MakingAMoveRequiresAConfirmationClick
data.value: Making a move requires a confirmation click

data.name: OnlineGameToolTip
data.value: Play Go against players on the IGS or OGS online servers.

data.name: SettingsToolTip
data.value: Change language, audio, visual style and many other things.

data.name: ShowTutorialButton
data.value: Show the tutorial button in main menu

data.name: SingleplayerToolTip
data.value: Learn Go, play against an AI, solve problems or gain experience completing quests.

data.name: StatisticsToolTip
data.value: View your winrate and other statistics.

data.name: ToggleFullscreenTooltip
data.value: Toggle fullscreen mode. (You may also use Alt+Enter on a PC.)

data.name: TutorialToolTip
data.value: This is the best place to learn Go if you don't know anything at all about the game.

data.name: WhenAnotherPlayerPlacesAStone
data.value: When another player places a stone

data.name: YouHaveAdvancedToNewRankX
data.value: You have advanced to a new omegaGo rank: {0}. Congratulations!

data.name: ResetAllProgress_Content
data.value: All game counters will be reduced to zero. All points will be lost. You will have the lowest rank. Information about what tsumego problems you solved will be lost. You will keep your current in-progress quests.

data.name: Tsumego_HowToSolveTsumegoText
data.value: Make the best moves possible against a virtual opponent who also makes the best moves. When you resolve the situation, you will be told it's solved. For more information, access help pages from the main menu.

data.name: Tsumego_ShowPossibleMoves_Tooltip
data.value: If checked, the app will highlight positions where it might make sense to play. They might not be all correct plays, but all non-highlighted positions are certainly incorrect plays.

data.name: Tsumego_YouHavePreviouslySolvedThisProblem
data.value: Solved (you have previously solved this problem).

data.name: MuteTooltip
data.value: Toggle muting all sounds (icon shows current state)
data.comment: Default option to continue to next line in tutorial

data.name: QuestsFooter
data.value: You receive a new quest every midnight, local time, unless you already have 3 quests.

data.name: Quest_ReplaceTooltip
data.value: You will lose this quest and any progress towards it, but you will immediately gain a different random quest.

data.name: Quest_TryThisNowTooltip
data.value: This will take you to a screen where you can work on this quest.

data.name: QuitText
data.value: Do you really want to exit the omegaGo program? All ongoing games will be cancelled.

data.name: IgsHyperlink
data.value: Create a new Pandanet account (opens a browser window)

data.name: IgsServerInfo
data.value: Pandanet is recommended if you don't have a KGS account and don't want to download an additional application to play Go online.

data.name: KgsServerInfo
data.value: You first need to create an account using the official KGS client. Download it on a desktop computer, login as a guest and then click User->Register.

data.name: LoginAtStartupCaption
data.value: Log in whenever you start omegaGo

data.name: ControlStyleChangeInfo
data.value: To apply control style change, please restart the application.

data.name: CanResignTooltip
data.value: If checked, Fuego will resign when it has little chance to win. Fuego will never resign in handicap games.

data.name: MaxPlayoutsTooltip
data.value: More playouts means more intelligent moves, but also more time taken to make a move.

data.name: PonderTooltip
data.value: If checked, Fuego will use continue thinking even when it's not its turn. This will increase Fuego's strength in timed games.

data.name: TreeDepthTooltip
data.value: A greater tree depth means more intelligent moves, but also more time taken to make a move.

data.name: EpicPlayQuest_Description
data.value: Finish any game on a 25x25 or larger board.

data.name: GettingStrongerQuest_Description
data.value: Win a solo game against Fuego.

data.name: HiddenQuest_Description
data.value: Your quest transformed! Solve any one tsumego problem.

data.name: IgsChallengeQuest_Description
data.value: Finish 3 games on the Pandanet server.

data.name: KgsChallengeQuest_Description
data.value: Finish 3 games on the KGS server.

data.name: OnlineTraditionalQuest_Description
data.value: Finish an online game on a 19x19 board.

data.name: PureSkillQuest_Description
data.value: Win a solo game against Fuego without handicap.

data.name: SoloVictoriesQuest_Description
data.value: Win 3 solo games against an AI program.

data.name: TotalMasteryQuest_Description
data.value: Win a solo game against Fuego where Fuego is playing black and has a handicap of 3 stones or more.

data.name: TraditionalQuest_Description
data.value: Finish any game on a 19x19 board.

data.name: UnevenStrengthQuest_Description
data.value: Finish two solo or online games where one player has a handicap of two stones or more.

data.name: Igs_LFG
data.value: I am looking for a game

data.name: Igs_OnlyShowLfgers
data.value: Only show players looking for a game

data.name: DeleteWarning
data.value: This will erase the file from the library permanently.

data.name: CancellationExplanation
data.value: The game was cancelled before it could be scored.

data.name: DisconnectionExplanation
data.value: You have lost connection to the online server. Check your internet connection. It is also possible you were disconnected because you logged in to this account on another computer.

data.name: StoneRemovalText
data.value: Click stones that should be removed from the board, then click 'Accept removed stones' to end the game.

data.name: Time_Absolute_Description
data.value: When a player's time elapses, that player loses immediately.

data.name: Time_Canadian_Description
data.value: Each player has a main time. When that elapses, the player enters their first "overtime period" and must make a number of moves (usually 25) in a number of minutes (usually 10) or lose when the last minute elapses. If they make all the moves in time, then their remaining time is lost, but another overtime period begins for that player.

data.name: Time_Japanese_Description
data.value: Each player has a main time. When that elapses, the player has a number of overtime periods. When the last elapses, the player loses. Whenever the player makes a move, their current overtime period "resets", i.e. if you don't spend the entire period, the whole period remains unspent.

data.name: Time_None_Description
data.value: There is no time limit for either player.

data.name: HumanDescription
data.value: This means that you (or a friend) will play this color on this device.

data.name: KgsLoginPhase_JoiningGlobalLists
data.value: Joining global games and challenges list...

data.name: UseGraceSecond
data.value: In online games, show 1 less second remaining on the clock.

data.name: AreYouSureYouWantToEndTheGame
data.value: Are you sure you want to end the game?

data.name: Igs_ConnectionError
data.value: Could not connect to Pandanet. Maybe your internet connection failed?

data.name: TogglingLFG
data.value: Toggling whether we are looking for games...

data.name: WrongCredentials
data.value: The username or password you entered is incorrect.

data.name: ExitLocal_Caption
data.value: Do you want to abandon the game?

data.name: ExitLocal_Text
data.value: Exiting this screen will end this game. It will not be counted in statistics at all.

data.name: ExitOnline_Text
data.value: Exiting this screen will cause you to resign this online game.

data.name: TimeControl_AbsoluteTooltip
data.value: When your time elapses, you lose.

data.name: TimeControl_CanadianTooltipByoyomi
data.value: "A/B remaining (C mins/period)" means that you have to make A more moves or lose. When you make those moves, you will have C more minutes to make B moves again.

data.name: TimeControl_CanadianTooltipMain
data.value: After your main time elapses, you will have to make {0} moves per {1} minutes.

data.name: TimeControl_JapaneseTooltip
data.value: "+A x Bs" means that after your current time elapses, you will still have A periods of B seconds each to make moves. If you don't use an entire period, it is not expended at all.

data.name: Validation_FluffyDepthTooSmall
data.value: Fluffy tree depth must be at least 1.

data.name: Validation_FuegoGamesTooFew
data.value: Fuego must be set to play at least 10 games.

data.name: Validation_NigiriIsForbidden
data.value: Pandanet does not allow the use of nigiri to choose a color.

data.name: Validation_SizeTooLarge
data.value: For this AI program, you must select a smaller board.

data.name: Validation_SizeTooSmall
data.value: For this AI program, you must select a larger board.

data.name: Validation_SquareNeeded
data.value: For this AI program, you must select a square board.

data.name: Validation_TimeControlError
data.value: A field ('{0}') doesn't contain a nonnegative integer.

data.name: Validation_YouMustHave19x19OrSmaller
data.value: Pandanet does not allow board sizes larger than 19x19.

data.name: Validation_YouMustHave2x2OrGreater
data.value: Board size must be 2x2 or larger.

data.name: Validation_YouMustHave38x38OrSmaller
data.value: KGS does not allow board sizes larger than 38x38.

data.name: Validation_YouMustHave5x5OrGreater
data.value: Pandanet does not allow board sizes smaller than 5x5.

data.name: Validation_YouMustHaveHalfInteger
data.value: Komi must be a half-integer, such as '0' or '7.5'.

data.name: Validation_YouMustHaveSmallerKomi
data.value: KGS requires that komi be between -100 and 100.

data.name: Validation_YouMustSelectASquareBoard
data.value: You must select a square board.
